User Agent:  

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open http://www.lto.de/de/html/nachrichten/2200/kirchliche-stiftungen-unterliegen-nicht-der-kontrolle-staatlicher-gerichte/
2. Print to PDF.


Actual results:

2. PDF is generated without a style sheet (because the style sheet effective on screen has media type "screen").


Expected results:

2. Enable the user to chose which of the style sheets associated with the current page is used for printing. Don't confine the user to certain "media types". Preselect the style sheet using the same method which is currently used to chose the style sheet.
comments.creator: kdevel@vogtner.de
